00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00031 
00032 // privileges checking
00033 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('reporting', 'r');
00034 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('reporting', 'w');
00035 
00036 if (!$can_read) {
00037     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00038 }
00039 
00040 /* loan report */
00041 $table = new simbio_table();
00042 $table->table_attr = 'align="center" class="border" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00043 
00044 // total number of member
00045 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(member_id) FROM member');
00046 $report_data = $report_query->fetch_row();
00047 $loan_report[__('Total Registered Members')] = $report_data[0];
00048 
00049 // total number of active member
00050 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(member_id) FROM member
00051     WHERE TO_DAYS(expire_date)>TO_DAYS(\''.date('Y-m-d').'\')');
00052 $report_data = $report_query->fetch_row();
00053 $loan_report[__('Total Active Member')] = $report_data[0];
00054 
00055 // total number of active member by membership type
00056 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT member_type_name, COUNT(member_id) FROM mst_member_type AS mt
00057     LEFT JOIN member AS m ON mt.member_type_id=m.member_type_id
00058     WHERE TO_DAYS(expire_date)>TO_DAYS(\''.date('Y-m-d').'\')
00059     GROUP BY m.member_type_id ORDER BY COUNT(member_id) DESC');
00060 $report_data = '';
00061 while ($data = $report_query->fetch_row()) {
00062     $report_data .= '<strong>'.$data[0].'</strong> : '.$data[1].', ';
00063 }
00064 $loan_report[__('Total Members By Membership Type')] = $report_data;
00065 
00066 // total expired member
00067 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(member_id) FROM member
00068     WHERE TO_DAYS(\''.date('Y-m-d').'\')>TO_DAYS(expire_date)');
00069 $report_data = $report_query->fetch_row();
00070 $loan_report[__('Total Expired Member')] = $report_data[0];
00071 
00072 // 10 most active member
00073 $report_query = $dbs->query('SELECT m.member_name, m.member_id, COUNT(loan_id) FROM loan AS l
00074     INNER JOIN member AS m ON m.member_id=l.member_id
00075     WHERE TO_DAYS(expire_date)>TO_DAYS(\''.date('Y-m-d').'\')
00076     GROUP BY l.member_id ORDER BY COUNT(loan_id) DESC LIMIT 10');
00077 $report_data = '<ul>';
00078 while ($data = $report_query->fetch_row()) {
00079     $report_data .= '<li>'.$data[0].' ('.$data[1].')</li>';
00080 }
00081 $loan_report[__('10 most active members')] = $report_data;
00082 
00083 // table header
00084 $table->setHeader(array(__('Membership Data Summary')));
00085 $table->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" colspan="3"';
00086 // initial row count
00087 $row = 1;
00088 foreach ($loan_report as $headings=>$report_data) {
00089     $table->appendTableRow(array($headings, ':', $report_data));
00090     // set cell attribute
00091     $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'class="alterCell" valign="top" style="width: 170px;"');
00092     $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'class="alterCell" valign="top" style="width: 1%;"');
00093     $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'class="alterCell2" valign="top" style="width: auto;"');
00094     // add row count
00095     $row++;
00096 }
00097 
00098 // if we are in print mode
00099 if (isset($_GET['print'])) {
00100     // html strings
00101     $html_str = '<html><head><title>'.$sysconf['library_name'].' Membership General Statistic Report</title>';
00102     $html_str .= '<style type="text/css">'."\n";
00103     $html_str .= 'body {padding: 0.2cm}'."\n";
00104     $html_str .= 'body * {color: black; font-size: 11pt;}'."\n";
00105     $html_str .= 'table {border: 1px solid #000000;}'."\n";
00106     $html_str .= '.dataListHeader {background-color: #000000; color: white; font-weight: bold;}'."\n";
00107     $html_str .= '.alterCell {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #CCCCCC;}'."\n";
00108     $html_str .= '.alterCell2 {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #FFFFFF;}'."\n";
00109     $html_str .= '</style>'."\n";
00110     $html_str .= '</head>';
00111     $html_str .= '<body>'."\n";
00112     $html_str .= '<h3>'.$sysconf['library_name'].' - '.__('Membership Report').'</h3>';
00113     $html_str .= '<hr size="1" />'."\n";
00114     $html_str .= $table->printTable();
00115     $html_str .= '<script type="text/javascript">self.print();</script>'."\n";
00116     $html_str .= '</body></html>'."\n";
00117     // write to file
00118     $file_write = @file_put_contents(REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.'member_stat_print_result.html', $html_str);
00119     if ($file_write) {
00120         // open result in new window
00121         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.openWin(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'/'.FILES_DIR.'/'.REPORT_DIR.'/member_stat_print_result.html\', \'popMemberReport\', 800, 500, true)</script>';
00122     } else { utility::jsAlert('ERROR! Membership statistic report failed to generate, possibly because '.REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.' directory is not writable'); }
00123     exit();
00124 }

00126 ?>
00127 <fieldset class="menuBox">
00128 <div class="menuBoxInner statisticIcon">
00129     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Membership Report')); ?>
00130     <hr />
00131     <form name="printForm" action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']; ?>" target="submitPrint" id="printForm" method="get" style="display: inline;">
00132     <input type="hidden" name="print" value="true" /><input type="submit" value="<?php echo __('Download Report'); ?>" class="button" />
